This year is Heisei 16, according to the Nengo dating system.
See here for Nengo and other japanese dating systems :
http://www.meiboku.demon.co.uk/guide/index.htm


-----Messaggio originale-----
Da: Daniele Frison [mailto:eriel666@...] 
Inviato: domenica 15 febbraio 2004 16.15
A: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Oggetto: [samuraihistory] informations about GENGO


Could someone of you tell me some informations about the dating sistem
known as "gengou" or "nengou". I know it was adopted in japan since VII
century (Taika Reform) and it was interrupted in 1947 with the
institution of the constitution. I also know that in 1979 Ohira
Masayoshi decided for the not obligatoriness of the use of this dating
sistem. Now, all I want to know is how this sistem works.

Sorry for the long preface!

Salut!

Daniele
